title: UNRANKED PLACEMENTS
body: Does anyone know what this highest rank is to get placed in on a fresh account that hasnt been ranked before? What would 10 wins - 0 Losses get me on average?

replies.body:
the highest you can get from unranked is Plat 1.

Most people who go 10-0 on fresh accounts get high gold though form what i've seen (watching people rank their smurf on streams and such).
I believe the plat 1 level is only for soft resets. Not a fresh account.
I believe the highest rank you can get placed off a fresh account is either gold 1 or plat 5.
